title: Startup Wants to Store Spare Renewable Electricity to Power Heavy Industry
sub_head: Rondo Energy, which raised $22 million in venture funding, wants to use renewable electricity when it is abundant to store as heat for industrial applications
body: Rondo Energy Inc. is taking on two problems complicating the shift to renewable energy: figuring out how to power heavy industry without burning fossil fuels and what to do with the surplus electricity weighing on prices when wind and solar power is abundant.
